piyuritanwaru engalanthaye da sathwa aarakshana nithi sammatha kalaha.kathlin ket liyanne 1654 di sathwa subhasadhana nithi sammatha karana ladde aarakshakayinge aagnyapanathe kotasak lesa bawath- oliwar kromwelge rajaya yatathe(1599-1658), eya ingrisi siwil yuddhayen pasuwa 1653 sita 1659 dakwa pawathi bawathya.

widhayaka janapathiwarun pas deneku athin he wishishtathama dawulwadakayata himi sammanaya laba atha.mama aar.premadasa,di.bi wijethunga,chandrika kumarathunga,mahinda rajapaksha,maithripala sirisena yana janapathiwarun athin wishishtathama dawul wadakayata himi sammanaya laba gaththa.thaththage maranin pasu 1990 di thamayi mama palamu janadhipathi sammanaya laba gaththe.me wanawita mama janadhipathi sammana witharak 30 k laba gena thibenawa.ape paramparawa issarahata geni yanna dan puthawa dalada maligawe rajakariwalata sambandha kara gaththa.eyath hondata dawula gahanawa.me rajakariya apen passe geniyanna kawuru hari nohitiyoth paramparawath ethanin nathi wenawa.mata ee baya dan naha .....

yowun podu rajya mandaliya krida ulela niyojanaya karana shri lanka awurudu 18 n pahala ragar kandayama ada pitathwa yayi.bambalapitiya santha pithara widuhale dhanushka ranjan ge nayakathwayen yuth me kandayamata ema widuhale dulaj perera, thrithwa widuhale kanil senewirathna, sanjaya somasiri, radika alwis, widya widyalaye richad dharmapala, hashan madhuranga, dharmaraja widuhale lochana eekanayaka, miyuru hewawasam, widyartha widuhale jesan disanayaka, aananda widuhale woshan randima saha rajakiya widuhale arshad jamaldin athulath wethi.landanaye ayil of man hi heta sita 13 dina dakwa pawathwena siwu wani yowun podu rajya mandalayiya krida ulele sath samajika ragar tharagawaliyata osteà·Šraliyawa, engalanthaya, kanadawa, dakunu apià·Šrakawa, skotlanthaya, trinidad and tubago, yana ratawal samaga shri lankawa tharaga wadithi.
